EntryName	MAR1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Melanoma antigen recognized by T-cells 1 (MART-1) (Antigen LB39-AA) (Antigen SK29-AA) (Protein Melan-A)
GeneName	MLANA MART1
Length	118
Function	Involved in melanosome biogenesis by ensuring the stability of GPR143. Plays a vital role in the expression, stability, trafficking, and processing of melanocyte protein PMEL, which is critical to the formation of stage II melanosomes.
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane; Golgi apparatus; Golgi apparatus; trans-Golgi network membrane; Melanosome
